messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

service now delete rule for automatically logged tickets that correspond to site profile paths tuesday re requested item warning hi two templates site work automatic tickets removed please thanks march requested item warning hi remember having spoken about automatically logged tickets roaming profile path change corresponding working site temporarily he advised these types tickets logged automatically checked cancelled please update meantime cancelled referenced needed past kind regards analyst ext hub friday march pm requested item warning close breaching please advised close breaching reference number summary roaming temp change work site priority resolution target date assigned engineer please ref msg
